register.reg_long_name: Debug OS Lock Data Transfer Register, Receive, External View
register.reg_condition: when EL1 is capable of using AArch32

purpose_text.para: Used for save/restore of DBGDTRRXint. It is a component of the Debug Communications Channel.

field_description.para: Writes to this register update the value in DTRRX and do not change RXfull.
Reads of this register return the last value written to DTRRX and do not change RXfull.
For the full behavior of the Debug Communications Channel, see .

access_permission_text.para: Arm deprecates reads and writes of DBGDTRRXext through the System register interface when the OS Lock is unlocked, DBGOSLSR.OSLK == 0.

ps.name: MRC
MCR
